sources.title: Alias the Champ
sources.description: Title: Alias the Champ Summary: New York gangsters trying to muscle in on the California wrestling scene come up against a wrestler who won't knuckle under. They frame him for a murder, and his manager and a cop set out ... Directed by: George Blair Actors: Robert Rockwell, Barbra Fuller, Audrey Long Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 15 October 1949 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 New York gangsters trying to muscle in on the California wrestling scene come up against a wrestler who won't knuckle under. They frame him for a murder, and his manager and a cop set out to clear his name, catch the real killers and save the reputation of the sport of wrestling.

metadata.Plot: New York gangsters trying to muscle in on the California wrestling scene come up against a wrestler who won't knuckle under. They frame him for a murder, and his manager and a cop set out to clear his name, catch the real killers and save the reputation of the sport of wrestling.
metadata.Actors: Robert Rockwell, Barbra Fuller, Audrey Long
